title: Disappointed.
content: We were disappointed by this fan. Just nowhere near the air movement expected given the other reviews. Moves less air than the Caframo fans that are 40% smaller. We bought the Holmes 12" fan and gosh do we love it.

title: Needed stronger airflow
content: My a/c went out and I thought this would help cool a 10 x 12 room. It help a little but the airflow in this fan was not strong enough. Definitely not turbo! I ended up using 2 fans for the job.

title: but also sounds like someone is mowing the lawn outside your window
content: I bought this to replace a smaller Lasko on my nightstand that was becoming too noisy on the high setting (too much rattle). I went with a slightly larger size hoping for more air movement.

title: Poor design quality required an adjusted after a few weeks
content: All in all--you get what you paid for. The fan worked for a few weeks and suddenly stopped. The fan is a poor quality design. The barrings were too tight resulting in the motor running while the fan blades remained motionless. I had to open the fan to loosen the barrings in order for the fan to work again.

title: Functional fan for cheap
content: I don't have A/C, just a lot of fans. This one will not cool down your entire apartment. In fact, I have it sitting in a windowsill (and resting on the couch, it's too big to sit on the sill alone) and pointed at my desk. If the fan is pointed directly at me it will keep me cool, but if it gets turned even an inch away and I don't notice, the circulation isn't enough to keep me from getting uncomfortably hot again, and I have very high heat tolerance. It's the quietest fan I own so I don't hear it normally. I would say that you would need to keep it close to your head to use it as white noise.

title: The quality is not very good. i don't know how many times can be ...
content: The quality is not very good. i don't know how many times can be used.The wind is not good enough.

title: Stopped working after just 2 hours!
content: I ordered two of these...one of them quit working after a couple of hours.

title: It's a fan. It works.
content: It's a fan. It pushes lots of air. It costs less than a  Dyson.

title: TINY! Caveat emptor
content: Maybe I'm foolish -- I will definitely check a product's dimensions when size is a question -- but this fan was a dead-ringer for the much larger "box"-type fan I was trying to replace... Much to my chagrin, when it arrived, it is apparent the fan is better suited to a desk or table than a floor. Also, the reason for the fan is my neighbor's bastard Pomeranian, whose incessant barking sounds someone scuffing their shoe on a wood floor over and over for hours on end (rent-control makes moving out less attractive).... Thus, the mighty box fan, and voila! cessation of migraine. This fan is nearly silent. Great product, no doubt! -- but not well suited to my purposes.

title: Three Stars
content: Fan worked great at first but died after a year.

title: these were fine for the price
content: i bought 2 of these to help circulate the air in my house, and honestly i expected more. theyre decent fans but I've had other models in the past and they had tons of power. these were fine for the price, but i was expecting more. dont expect a lot of power out of these guys, but good for a desk fan or small bedroom.

title: This is not so good. the speed is very bad
content: This is not so good.the speed is very bad.the quality is not so good.

title: Only one problem but a deal breaker for me.
content: Good fan.  I had it for  about 18 months or so.  Not noisy. Worked fine.  But I could not take it apart to clean the blades.  So even though it still worked, I gave it away.

title: Was great until it started knocking

I thought they were the perfect size to give a nice breeze in my kids' room, but this fan is driving me crazy with an annoying clicking sound. It's a wonder the baby went back to sleep. I'm guessing the fan blade is slightly off and knocking against the inside.

title: Will NOT tilt DOWN

title: No issues. Work as describe

title: :D

title: Too quiet for my liking :-(

title: Decent Fan, but Not an Air Circulator.
content: This is NOT an air circulator fan.  Don't even try to compare to a Vornado!  I am a huge "fan" of great fans as we live in a very hot area.  This is a decent fan to move a little air in the room, or to aim directly at a person who wants a breeze for a slight cooling effect, but I think the name is misleading.  It is an OK fan...but does not work to vent a room as the name suggests.

title: It's a very tiny little fan doesn't blow great amount for air
content: It's a very tiny little fan doesn't blow great amount for air; good for people who want a less pressure fan on their table top right beside them. Doesn't bend downward only upwdards.

title: Definitely NOT a turbo fan.
content: It works. But it is NOT a turbo fan. It puts out a fair amount of air... but turbo, it is NOT. I bought it because I am looking for a high-speed, TURBO fan that PUSHES air... I need some air MOVEMENT. This is a plain old fan, that is IT. It works. It gets 3 stars for working, as a fan should. But advertising this as a TURBO fan is very VERY disingenuous. Sorry. Don't buy this if you need a high-speed or high-output fan.

title: Three Stars
content: They would be great for a desk fan. Too small for much else

title: These are nice and compact but don't put off much air
content: These are nice and compact but don't put off much air. I probably should have splurged on a nicer fan.

title: It's ok!
content: Good fan, very reliable. But on the fastest setting it's not very fast. But it's ok, it move a good amount of air!

title: Three Stars

title: Three Stars

The black one has much noise, I feel very bad and I cannot go to sleep because of the noise. And the white one is much quiet, sometimes you cannot feel it is there. May trash it later.

title: Not good for cooling a room
content: Do not get this fan if you are looking to cool a room down. The blades are tiny and barely move air. Most fans have big blades that push a lot of air and that creates a nice breeze, but this create one focused stream that you can't feel unless directly in front of it.

title: Not the same as previous iterations. No "turboforce" here.
content: I have purchased this fan for years and have been pleased. Received today, compared with my existing fan and found the following changes: substantially lighter, smaller motor, smaller fan blades, high speed is equivalent to previous low speed. Medium and low speeds move almost no air at all. No "turboforce" here. Would struggle to blow out a birthday cake candle. Pick another brand!

title: Don't waste your money!

The other two settings are so weak that when they are on, the only way you know it is on is the sound, otherwise, there is absolutely no air circulating.

title: 2 fans stopped working within a month
content: Ordered two fans separately and both have stopped working within a month. Its not an over voltage or over current issue since my home is protected from surges. Also checked the fuse on the plug of the device with a multimeter and is functional. Definitely a bad design issue or some kind of systemic problem. Honeywell needs to fix this.

title: Don't waste your money

UPDATE: Fan just stopped working. It's been hot here in Cali and I was using it frequently but today it just stopped. No reason just done. I tried different outlets but its the fan. I wouldn't buy it. It didn't even last a month.

title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!

title: I ordered 2 of these. One of them wouldn't ...
content: I ordered 2 of these. One of them wouldn't turn on after a month, and I haven't even used it regularly. The other one just died, after about a month of regular 4-hour use.

title: Very Disappointing!
content: I'm not sure I have the same fan that everyone is raving about. You must run it at the highest speed. The first two settings barely blow any air. On the highest speed I had to place it a couple feet away from me to feel it. I was very disappointed, especially considering the price. I have a fan that I bought for 9.99 that is louder, and not as well made. It's a metal fan, but it generates much more air, and I usually keep it on medium because high is too strong. I needed another fan, and this got such great reviews. If you want a fan you are going to keep right on top of you, this is fine, on the highest speed. I think it's better to buy a fan in person where you can feel how much air it will blow. My son just walked by it for the first time, and put his hand in front of it. His comment was 'unacceptable'. That says it - in a nutshell.

title: Not at all great. Weak. Slow.
content: I have no clue where the good reviews are coming from. I must have received a damaged one. The fan casing is bigger than the actual fan wings. It's super low and slow. It doesn't not even blown piece of paper from the front of it. I find it was a waste of money.

title: Wish it was beter

title: Works Well while it last

title: Poor quality control

I hope they last the summer. Disappointed that I wasted money on the ones that quit. I would not order them again.

title: I have friends with the same model and theirs were fine.

title: Much too gentle breeze
content: We had three of the old version of these fans for about four years, used them a lot.  They began to get noisy so we decided to replace all three.  The new ones look the same and are exactly the same size but the motor is much weaker than the original.  It pushes less air so what the old ones could do on speed 2 the new ones need to be on the highest speed 3.  The box claims they are 25% quieter, not a surprise since they must be at least 25% less powerful.

title: Decent but not amazing

However, this underperforms compared to the Walmart one and they are same size. The Walmart one brought turbo air, not this. I'm just going to keep this because it was only less than 10$.

title: Nothing turbo about it
content: I'm honestly baffled on how this has had such great reviews.

title: ... one of these and purchased another one because we liked it so much
content: We already owned one of these and purchased another one because we liked it so much! The new one barely moves air at all on the lowest setting. The high setting blows about like the low setting on our older one. NOT turbo force sadly :( Our daughter likes it so we will keep it, but very disappointed in the low amount of air movement.

title: Unhappy with my purchase.

Much to my chagrin, when it arrived, it is apparent the fan is better suited to a desk or table than a floor. Also, the reason for the fan is my neighbor's bastard Pomeranian, whose incessant barking sounds someone scuffing their shoe on a wood floor over and over for hours on end (rent-control makes moving out less attractive).... Thus, the mighty box fan, and voila! cessation of migraine. This fan is nearly silent. Great product, no doubt! -- but not well suited to my purposes.

title: A great fan IF pointed right at you
content: After reading all the reviews which said this is a great fan that circulates air really well, I was expecting something much better. This tiny fan is a great bargain IF you live in a small apartment like I do. It works well at all speeds but it needs to be directed right at you, and at short distances only. Even the fastest speed hardly created any air movement when I moved 8 feet from the fan. As for circulating air, it's okay, but definitely not enough when it's a hot stifling day. I would recommend this in addition to another fan/AC in the room, or if you sleep with it pointed at you from a nearby desk. It does not oscillate, so do not expect it to circulate air too well. That said, for less than $15, this is a budget bargain.

title: HOW IS THIS A BEST SELLER??
content: Wow this was by far the most hyped up fan on amazon, with a whopping 12,000 reviews making it best seller. So i went ahead and put my trust in my fellow amazon shoppers. But i have to say, you guys let me down. I almost want to say this fan is horrible, but I think useless is a better word. I was reading someones review and he was talking about how it was good for circulating air. That may be true, as it doesnt seem very "turbo" at all, but strangely i did notice it blowing my curtains which were 10 feet away. However this fan does not make me nor the air in my apartment feel the slightest bit cooler. It blows warm air around. I tried putting it in front of my window ac unit, thinking it would pull that cool air and distribute it, nope. Did nothing. I tried putting nxt to my open window to help feel cool air, nothing. I tried it by itself, just on my counter 3 feet away, didnt feel the slightest bit cooler. Maybe theres some magical secret that everyone else knows about how to make this thing work good, because I sure as hell dont. Complete disappointment for me. I gotta return it and try something else.

content: I purchased this fan on 3/9/17 and it completely stopped working on 7/27/17. It was used in my home office, not a harsh environment. The airflow was less than I expected from reading other reviews. I do not recommend.

title: Worked for 3 month only.
content: Very disappointing. This fan stop working after only 3 months.

title: extremely weak motor. I have an older one that's ...
content: extremely weak motor. I have an older one that's the exact same model. The older one on the low setting is way more powerful than the new one on the high setting.

title: Inconsistent Quality
content: First one I ordered had a buzzing noise. The replacement died in about 3 weeks. I have 2 others just like it and they work great. Too bad. When they work they're great little fans and move a lot of air.

title: Not at all great. Weak. Slow.
content: I have no clue where the good reviews are coming from. I must have received a damaged one. The fan casing is bigger than the actual fan wings. It's super low and slow. It doesn't not even blown piece of paper from the front of it. I find it was a waste of money.

title: Piece of crap fan and a company that's dead to me
content: So the fan doesn't work, brand new out of the box. Turn it on and nothing. Piece of crap fan and a company that's dead to me

title: Good from 4" away, but otherwise don't bother
content: Wow, the new motor they put in this fan stinks. All the good reviews had me excited for a small, reasonably quiet "turbo" fan. It delivered on the quiet, but the fan power is nearly non existent. What a waste.

title: One Star
content: There's a shortage in the plug so sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't

title: Just ok
content: We have been using this fan for about a year. It's still working well but I have noticed when we angle it upward, it doesn't work as well. It has definitely slowed down overall since we have purchased it. But it does still move air fairly well, on the highest speed. I would say it's just an ok fan.

title: Adequate
content: If this fan tilted down it would be a lot more useful. Controls are difficult to access. This is an average, bare bones fan that is adequate at blowing air around.

title: so-so
content: Certainly not the turbo force that I expected. Does put decent amount of air out, but it is not as good as some of the reviews on here. Also, if you are looking for a white noise generator, this is not your fan.-  some may appreciate the relative quiet of this fan.

title: Not so turbo
content: We have this fan in white for our sons room, so we purchased two more for our travel trailer. For some reason these are much quieter (we were looking for some noise) and I would hardly call the amount of air it produces turbo.

title: ... but it generates a little more noise than I like.
content: Bought this fan to place by the bed for sleeping but it generates a little more noise than I like.

title: Three Stars
content: Too quiet

title: my lasko is beautiful and really cold also like my Massey
content: I give this a 3 because it is quite and that's it, Massey fan is 5 times stronger and the same size, don't believe what they say about it being really strong and really cold in the reviews, trust I have 3 other fans set up in my house, my lasko is beautiful and really cold also like my Massey fan

title: Disappointed.
content: We were disappointed by this fan. Just nowhere near the air movement expected given the other reviews. Moves less air than the Caframo fans that are 40% smaller. We bought the Holmes 12" fan and gosh do we love it.

title: Doesn't move much air
content: Seems like a good fan, but I can't believe how little air it moves on the highest speed. Do not buy if you're expecting a powerful fan.

title: Quiet but not powerful
content: Pros .. This is a great fan for an office or small area to blow on one person one direction because it doesn't rotate  . It hardly makes any noise . Cons .. not a lot of power but overall for the price it's ok for a gentle breeze .

title: but I guess it's not so bad for a little fan
content: I don't think this fan is all that powerful, but I guess it's not so bad for a little fan.

title: Three Stars
content: ok switch on off is not well conceived

title: Left outside on porch in plain sight on busy street
content: Left outside on porch in plain sight on busy street

title: Good for small areas
content: Works really well in a small room, but it's a small fan so don't expect too much from it.

title: A great fan IF pointed right at you
content: After reading all the reviews which said this is a great fan that circulates air really well, I was expecting something much better. This tiny fan is a great bargain IF you live in a small apartment like I do. It works well at all speeds but it needs to be directed right at you, and at short distances only. Even the fastest speed hardly created any air movement when I moved 8 feet from the fan. As for circulating air, it's okay, but definitely not enough when it's a hot stifling day. I would recommend this in addition to another fan/AC in the room, or if you sleep with it pointed at you from a nearby desk. It does not oscillate, so do not expect it to circulate air too well. That said, for less than $15, this is a budget bargain.

title: Three Stars
content: Not real powerful but gets the job done for a small office space/room

title: Moves lots of air very loudly
content: Used it to keep cool occasionally, very good at moving air. However, it started rattling terribly whenever it was on Speed 3 or 2; for reference, I could hear it during games through my over-ear headphones, and it was punishing for my teammates who had to listen to it whenever we talked. I cannot recommend this product because of the noise defect that appeared from light use, which has rendered the fan useless.

title: ( Otherwise it's nice and compact
content: No turbo force as the name suggests :(

title: The fan is OK and quite quiet at the low ...
content: The fan is OK and quite quiet at the low setting but mine had a bit of a knock at the higher speeds. Returned it for something else. Might've been OK if it wasn't so close to me that I couldn't hear the knock but that wasn't the case. Oh well, can't win them all.

title: Only lasts a few months.
content: This fan was great, until it stopped working. I think I used it for 3 months and then one day it wouldn't turn on anymore.

title: Three Stars
content: Not a very efficient Fan.

title: It works just fine, I hate how it collects dust ao quick
content: It works just fine, I hate how it collects dust ao quick, and is hard to clean. I use it only in my room, which is rather small but works just fine.

title: Fan works and is reasonably quite. However, the ...
content: Fan works and is reasonably quite. However, the hinges are not particularly tough and my fan has been broken off it's base after three years of light to normal use.

title: Three Stars
content: Worked great until fuse blew. Now it doesn't work at all.

title: TINY! Caveat emptor
content: Maybe I'm foolish -- I will definitely check a product's dimensions when size is a question -- but this fan was a dead-ringer for the much larger "box"-type fan I was trying to replace... Much to my chagrin, when it arrived, it is apparent the fan is better suited to a desk or table than a floor. Also, the reason for the fan is my neighbor's bastard Pomeranian, whose incessant barking sounds someone scuffing their shoe on a wood floor over and over for hours on end (rent-control makes moving out less attractive).... Thus, the mighty box fan, and voila! cessation of migraine. This fan is nearly silent. Great product, no doubt! -- but not well suited to my purposes.

title: Was great until it started knocking
content: As I sit in my infants room at 2:30 AM, I'm writing this review because I'm so disappointed. This is the second of these fans I have purchased. I thought they were the perfect size to give a nice breeze in my kids' room, but this fan is driving me crazy with an annoying clicking sound. It's a wonder the baby went back to sleep. I'm guessing the fan blade is slightly off and knocking against the inside.

title: Not That Strong
content: This was not nearly as strong as I had hoped or advertised by other reviews.  It is quiet, it moves air, but even the high setting feels low.  Disappointed as I had higher expectations for something called "TurboForce."

title: Smaller than expected
content: Nice little fan but the reason for a lower rating is because I didn't read the overall dimensions.  I expected a 15" Diameter fan given the product title, this fan is closer to 11" Diameter the overall frame size is 15".

title: Three Stars
content: Works well but kind of noisy

title: Good for small office or room
content: Not very powerful.  Good for small office or room.

title: Three Stars
content: Not a bad fan, but didn't blow as hard as one would expect something with Turboforce in the name

title: Will NOT tilt DOWN

title: :D
content: As described nice.

title: Three Stars
content: Noisy but just about works right.

title: Three Stars
content: much smaller than i thought

title: Good for Small Spaces
content: Pretty much a modern desk fan. Quiet, small and moves what little air it was designed for efficiently. As a house fan for large rooms there are better choices as calling it a room fan is a stretch unless you're in a cell.

title: Decent fan, starts making noises after a few months
content: The fan worked just as expected of a fan. It was pretty quiet and strong, perfect for my dorm room.

title: Too quiet for my liking :-(
content: Good fan but not what I was looking for overall. I sleep with a fan on for the noise and this was just too quiet(I know, I know I'm probably the only one who complains about it being too quiet, haha!)

title: loud
content: This thing is loud...but it performs decently for a 7 inch blade.

title: Three Stars
content: Quality isn't that well.

title: Meh
content: It's not very powerful even on its highest setting.

title: Meh, 3 months isnt bad.
content: Worked for about 3 months. Then seized and is dead, took apart and it's hopeless, poor thing was such a nice fan. Do yourself a favor and go hurricane or lorell, :P

title: It's a very tiny little fan doesn't blow great amount for air
content: It's a very tiny little fan doesn't blow great amount for air; good for people who want a less pressure fan on their table top right beside them. Doesn't bend downward only upwdards.

title: Packaging Unacceptable but the Fan is Quiet
content: When I reciaved this package it was in the items manufacture box, which I found unacceptable since it was an electronic device with no real protection. The seal on the box was also broken and worn. This item could have been tampered with or destroyed by water or other factors. I am dissappinted in the lack of packaging, however, for 13$ it is a very quiet fan and although it feels somewhat cheaper because of its complete plastic body but the motor runs smooth.

title: Too hard to clean
content: Works well but hard to clean once it gets dusty (doesn't come apart, screen pop off, etc). So not bad for the money but wouldn't buy it/this style again. Gave it 3 stars since it works well otherwise.

title: HOW IS THIS A BEST SELLER??
content: Wow this was by far the most hyped up fan on amazon, with a whopping 12,000 reviews making it best seller. So i went ahead and put my trust in my fellow amazon shoppers. But i have to say, you guys let me down. I almost want to say this fan is horrible, but I think useless is a better word. I was reading someones review and he was talking about how it was good for circulating air. That may be true, as it doesnt seem very "turbo" at all, but strangely i did notice it blowing my curtains which were 10 feet away. However this fan does not make me nor the air in my apartment feel the slightest bit cooler. It blows warm air around. I tried putting it in front of my window ac unit, thinking it would pull that cool air and distribute it, nope. Did nothing. I tried putting nxt to my open window to help feel cool air, nothing. I tried it by itself, just on my counter 3 feet away, didnt feel the slightest bit cooler. Maybe theres some magical secret that everyone else knows about how to make this thing work good, because I sure as hell dont. Complete disappointment for me. I gotta return it and try something else.

title: Its pequito
content: So tiny

title: Definitely NOT a turbo fan.
content: It works. But it is NOT a turbo fan. It puts out a fair amount of air... but turbo, it is NOT. I bought it because I am looking for a high-speed, TURBO fan that PUSHES air... I need some air MOVEMENT. This is a plain old fan, that is IT. It works. It gets 3 stars for working, as a fan should. But advertising this as a TURBO fan is very VERY disingenuous. Sorry. Don't buy this if you need a high-speed or high-output fan.

title: Doesnt bend downward.
content: Great fan, but it doesnt bend downwards which was surprising

title: ... upright it makes a strange ringing sound that gets annoying and doesn't allow me to sleep
content: The fan is powerful but when sitting on the stand upright it makes a strange ringing sound that gets annoying and doesn't allow me to sleep. Have to position it upside and it is quiet. Bummer because I wanted it to sleep.

title: decent for the price... I definitely should ...
content: decent for the price...I definitely should have paid more attention to the size before ordering (it's reeeally small lol) but it's getting the job done :-)

However,  It quite literally moves at minimum double the air that this Honeywell does. So...lesson learned.  I would not ever buy one of these again.

title: Three Stars
content: Lasted about 4 months till motor quit.

title: Completely stopped working in less than a year. The ...
content: Completely stopped working in less than a year. The motor makes noise, but the fan doesn't spin. I don't know what I expected from a $10 fan, but to burn out in less than a year is unacceptable.

title: One Star
content: I just got it and out of the box it doesn't work at all. What a scam

title: super dope!

title: Extremely Weak Fan - Better off using a hand held fan.....
content: Bought this for my daughter who likes to have a fan on her face at night.  This basically has 1 setting, which isn't that great.  I bought another fan for myself a year before and that fan's lowest setting matches this fan's highest setting and the cost was only a few dollars.  The other two settings are so weak that when they are on, the only way you know it is on is the sound, otherwise, there is absolutely no air circulating.

title: Died within a week
content: Died within a week. Was sleeping with the fan on level 3, woke up to it granading itself. Total yard sale all over my room. One star for the fuse in the plug blowing, POS probably would have caught fire.

content: Weak fan, great for small spaces & as a personal fan---no more than that

title: Re-packaged?
content: Package arrived taped together, had obviously been opened and taped shut prior to ups label being attached.  Looks terrible, suspect it is a used product, not new.

title: I ordered 2 of these. One of them wouldn't ...
content: I ordered 2 of these. One of them wouldn't turn on after a month, and I haven't even used it regularly. The other one just died, after about a month of regular 4-hour use.

title: Big disappointment.
content: Quit after 6 months. Never made a distress noise,  just wouldn't turn back on. Big disappointment.

title: Suck broken
content: This fan worked for about 12 hours and then decided to stop working now I cannot get it to work do not waste your time I would love a full refund but I doubt that's going to happen do not buy this product

title: Two Stars
content: The older models had more power. This one feels too weak even on highest setting

title: Two Stars
content: very weak fan, you get what you pay for. should have bought a Vornado instead. Was not double boxed.

title: This fan won't cool you off much!
content: I know this is a small fan, but unless you are directly on top of it, you can barely feel a breeze!

title: 7 months of good use, now garbage.
content: Bought it for my desk at work, worked great since about mid Jan. Now it's July, the fan blades don't want to turn - have to give them a physical boost to get them moving. I've cleaned out the fan but no good. Won't be getting another.

title: Turbo force is a Turbo Lie
content: This fan even on high setting doesn't blow enough air and it has Turbo Force on it.. my blow dryer on a low setting blows harder then this.. I waste of MONEY

title: I have friends with the same model and theirs were fine.
content: The fan I got makes this buzzinv noise in the fan. I have friends with the same model and theirs were fine.

title: Sounds like a jet engine, doesn't work that well.
content: Purchased this fan because the air conditioning in my house, that works perfectly fine in the main part of the house and other bedrooms, does not seem to function in my bedroom. Just needed something to help circulate the air a bit more than my overhead fan to help me sleep because Florida summers are brutal.

title: Alright fan for the price, but better check other options
content: This fan is okay for the low price. But the fan speed and circulation isn't that good which was important for me.

title: The fan's highest speed feels like it should be its slowest
content: The fan doesn't give that much air as i expected. The fan's highest speed feels like it should be its slowest. But my biggest disappointment is that the fan doesn't tilt down so i cant put it on my dresser.

title: Doesn't work for bedroom
content: We bought this for our sons room and it barely cools anything down. Does not work well, going with a different brand all together. It's quiet and says it's powerful but definitely is not.

title: Continuously goes out
content: I recently purchased this fan and the motor stops  working randomly. If that didn't happen it would be a great little fan for the price.

title: Two Stars
content: Has already ceased working after only a few months of owning it.

title: It's not a cheap Vornado. Buy the Vornado.
content: I bought this because a review suggested it was a less expensive vornado. Truth be told it's highest speed is, at best, the Vornado's lowest.  It's an ok fan 2 feet from your face. But it has lackluster air movement beyond that. Spring for the real deal.

title: Barely blows
content: I have an older one and it works much better.

title: Low airflow - like a personal battery fan -  Nothing turbo here.
content: Much less airflow than the clip on lasko 2400 https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000QOMZT4/ref=oh_aui_search_detailpage?ie=UTF8&psc=1 which I already own - and this takes up more space!  The high speed is just a mild breeze and the low  speed is completely useless.

title: Unhappy with my purchase.
content: TurboForce? Minimal output is more like it. The high setting on these is pretty worthless and has almost no effect on moving air. Thankfully they were cheap, so I didn't lose out on much money.

title: Spend your money elsewhere, cheap.
content: Cheap plastic, barely moves air.

title: Buy a Different Fan!
content: I read the mixed reviews about output on this fan, and decided to risk it at the low price. I needed a small fan for my son's bedroom. The high setting on this fan is what I would consider to be a low. It doesn't move much air, and the adjustment (up & down) range leaves a lot to be desired for me. It arrived on time with no issues. I would not buy this again.

title: Works Well while it last
content: The fan works  well for a while, then it starts making this horrible screeching noise a few months later. The noise  happens when i first cut the fan on and last  about five minutes. Then is normal again.

title: Don’t Buy It
content: WHY BOTHER? I have no idea why people gave this fan great reviews-waste of money, and time. I would Love my money back.

title: Decent but not amazing
content: I bought a 14.95 Walmart brand fan and saw this fan for sale at 9.85 shipped. I returned that and ordered this. However, this underperforms compared to the Walmart one and they are same size. The Walmart one brought turbo air, not this. I'm just going to keep this because it was only less than 10$.

title: 1 STAR WAS HATE IT. I dont hate it
content: 1 STAR WAS HATE IT. I dont hate it, BUT not a very good OR powerful FAN.

title: Two Stars
content: Too noisy. It's not a cheap price for this zero feature on-the-floor fan.

title: Two Stars
content: The fans works fine but the package was almost open. 👎🏻

title: Used to be good quality
content: I had a previous version of this fan that's lasted about five years but recently it's gotten too loud to sleep with even with frequent oiling and cleaning. This new one is quieter than my old one but already louder than I remember.

title: Does not put out the air that I was expecting ...

title: Two Stars
content: Fan is weak. Doesn't push out a lot of air even on the highest speed

title: Does not blow very hard
content: Hardly moves air even on the "high" setting.  I should return this fan but it's a hassle, I think they count on that...

title: Not high velocity

title: Not like the old ones
content: This is my 2nd one of this model the 1st one the motor quit in the 1st half year. I'll give it one more try and then I'm done with Honeywell fans they literally don't make them like they use to. I have some old ones use everyday all summer long and the just keep going not this one and a larger one I'm taking apart and if it's the motor I'll just throw them away.

title: Noisy
content: Noisy little monster. Too loud to sleep with

title: Poor quality control
content: We purchased four of these little fans for our upstairs bedrooms.  Two of the fans stopped working after a couple of weeks.  We even tried putting in new plug fuses.  They are completely dead.  The other two fans are still running after two months of nearly constant running.  If the quality control were better, I would say it is a fine fan for bedroom use. I hope they last the summer. Disappointed that I wasted money on the ones that quit. I would not order them again.

title: I don't think this is honeywell
content: This is not honeywell . This fan is so weak doesn't blow any air even at max speed. Turboforce no way I have other honeywell I bought few years ago and  there 10x stronger

title: Nothing turbo about it
content: I'm honestly baffled on how this has had such great reviews.

title: ... one of these and purchased another one because we liked it so much
content: We already owned one of these and purchased another one because we liked it so much! The new one barely moves air at all on the lowest setting. The high setting blows about like the low setting on our older one. NOT turbo force sadly :( Our daughter likes it so we will keep it, but very disappointed in the low amount of air movement.

title: Dead fan
content: Doesn't really move air in my office or help pull air from the lame a/c, which is tucked back in a dormer. I was hoping this fan would help draw the cool air into the main part of my office, but no such luck.
